prompts: Create a legendary Dragon-type Pokemon with sleek black scales and glowing blue accents.
Generate a powerful Electric-type Pokemon that resembles a dragon, with menacing wings and sharp claws.
Design a mythical creature that embodies both dragon and electric elements, featuring striking color contrasts.
Imagine a large, imposing Pokemon with a fearsome appearance, perfect for a showdown in battles.
Make a fierce Pokemon with a dark color palette and bright accents, ideal for an urban environment.
Show me a Pokemon that combines dragon-like features and electric powers, standing tall in a forest.
Give me a unique design of a legendary Pokemon that looks both intimidating and majestic.
